subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Kayla Roncin, 12, of Toms River, N.J., and Mo’ne Davis, 13, of Philadelphia, played together in regional events that award berths to the Little League World Series.
snippet: Kayla Roncin, 12, of Toms River, N.J., and Mo’ne Davis, 13, of Philadelphia, played together in regional events that award berths to the Little League World Series.
